pr_title: Add Internationalization (i18n) plugin and Myanmar UDFs

timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: This is what we use for the Facebook site - we are experimenting with this, but for now we don't have data supporting a different threshold.
replies.author: nlagrow

replies.bodyText: Maybe define it as a constant. You can also consider adding a function taking threshold as input.
replies.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText:
Added a constant - I think adding functions w. threshold as input is a great idea, but let's keep it simple in this rev.
I'm thinking of:

add threshold as an option to both MYANMAR_FONT_ENCODING and MYANMAR_NORMALIZE_UNICODE
add an option for whether to split on newlines to MYANMAR_FONT_ENCODING - a lot of times, Myanmar content will be posted as paragraphs of Zawgyi followed by paragraphs of Unicode

but for now, MYANAMR_NORMALIZE_UNICODE should help the most with any text matching queries
replies.author: nlagrow
